title: Tower of Ruin: Volume II: A Dark Dungeon Realm LitRPG
description: What you will give to survive the crucible Daniel? No one comes out unmarred.A tower, perched on the edge of infinity.A man, doomed to wander its floors eternally.A mission, where the balance of the world is at stake.Leaving behind the trials of the first floor, Daniel advances. The 2nd floor, the Survivor’s Crucible and all its horrors await. But Daniel will cover more than just one floor, driven by a short-term goal to meet up with his former comrades on the 3rd and 5th floor. He’ll need them. I give myself.(Summer/2021 - Possible early launch)
author: Wolfe Locke
